vote.text: Amendment SA 6484 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 6484 proposed by Senator Schumer for Senator Hyde-Smith. (consideration: CR S6768; text: CR S6768) To amend the preamble.

Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 6484 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
